'''The Guardian of Zion Award''' is an annual award given since 1997 to [[Jew]]s who have been supportive of the State of [[Israel]]. It is awarded at the [[Ingeborg Rennert Center for Jerusalem Studies]] at [[Bar-Ilan University]], where the prize recipient gives the keynote address. {|class="wikitable" ! Year !! Recipient !!
